text: (And it was not (vouchsafed) to any mortal that Allah should speak to him unless (it be) by revelation or from behind a veil...) [42:51]. The Jews said to the Prophet, Allah bless him and give him peace: �Do you not speak [directly] with Allah and look at Him as did Moses? This is if you are really a Prophet. We will never believe in you until you do that�. He said: �Moses did not look at Allah, exalted is He�. Then, Allah, exalted is He, revealed this verse.
